Package com.paypal.android.sdk.payments

Class Summary
PaymentActivity Primary Activity for the PayPal Android SDK.
PaymentConfirmation Provides all information needed to confirm & verify the payment.
PayPalPayment Describes the transaction.

This object describes the payment request, and should be submitted to the PaymentActivity via the PaymentActivity.EXTRA_PAYMENT intent extra.
PayPalService Service responsible for communicating with PayPal's servers.

This service should be started shortly before you expect the user to make a purchase, and stopped when the user is finished shopping.
ProofOfAdaptivePayment Proof of Payment for PayPal transactions.

All payments must be verified.
ProofOfPayment Abstract proof of payment.

Be sure to verify all payments.
Objects derived from ProofOfPayment are created after a payment has been completed and should be considered read-only.
ProofOfRestPayment Proof of Payment for Credit Card transactions.

All payments must be verified.
